data.name: Vampires Dawn 3 - The Crimson Realm
data.detailed_description:
The english version will be available in Q3/2021!


Vampires Dawn 3 is a 2D retro pixel RPG full of vampires, blood and tragic moments!
Follow Asgar Serrans bloody path through a world in which humankind only has the sacred crusade to prevent extinction. Is there still hope or will the vampires finally conquer the world? And what dark purpose do the ancient Elras have by hunting the vampires mercilessly?

Features


  • 2D Retro-RPG in Pixel-Style
  • A lot of pixel-blood and a dark & mysterious atmosphere
  • Open game world with countless secrets
  • Versatile and dramatic story
  • 30+ hours of game time
  • Diverse and exciting side quests
  • Turn-based side-view combat system
  • Extensive magic system
  • Turn people into vampires to add them to your party
  • Summon Werewolves, Demons, Zombies and Skeletons for combat

About the Vampires Dawn Franchise



Vampires Dawn is a vampire role-playing series created in Germany, which is characterized by a 2D retro pixel look, an open game world, a complex and versatile story, extensive interaction options and a lot of pixel blood.

data.short_description: Vampires Dawn 3 is a 2D retro pixel RPG full of vampires, blood and tragic moments! Follow Asgar Serrans bloody path through a world in which humankind only has the sacred crusade to prevent extinction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium, AMD Athlon
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 980, AMD Radeon 7850, Intel Iris
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060, AMD Radeon 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Vampires Dawn 3 - The Crimson Realm

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains Pixel-Blood and Gore
Contains violent behavior of the game actors
Contains mild, non-explicit nudity (semi-hidden female breasts and pixelated artworks)

In-game killing of game characters in a variety of ways (e.g. burning, mutilating, severing heads and limbs). Non-player characters can be bitten and turned into vampires. Characters can be captured and tortured.
The player makes in-game decisions that determine life and death for other characters.

The player can summon and control undead creatures (skeletons, zombies).

The player will kill monsters, animals and humane enemies in the course of the game to reach the end of the game.

The game includes very frequent depictions of blood splatter due to hits with swords and other weapons.

The game's storyline includes themes of psychological, physical and sexual violence against men and women (but does not endorse or glorify it).
